text:
Inflation was never “transitory” and the data clearly bears this out. 

The American people cannot afford to live under Biden’s reckless tax and spending agenda. https://t.co/RiozwK1jdS

If it wasn’t abundantly clear already that Biden’s failed policies are directly to blame for the worsening crisis at our southern border, take a look at the clip below.
 
With thousands of migrants marching towards the U.S., it’s time to wake up and finally secure the border! https://t.co/OwFGIrhk0S

Today marks 78 years since more than 160,000 Allied troops launched the largest amphibious invasion in history to liberate Nazi-occupied Europe during World War II. Please join me in recognizing the heroism and sacrifice made by these brave men on D-Day. https://t.co/KuJjsL5RIi

Tropical Storm Alex is expected to form in the Gulf of Mexico today and will likely make landfall in Southwest Florida as soon as tomorrow morning. Please use this time to get prepared, be vigilant and closely follow @NHC_Atlantic for updates on the storm https://t.co/48EiqFFFg2

Despite clear warning signs pointing to the baby formula shortage LAST FALL, the Biden administration sat on their hands for months! 

And now, 70% of the country’s baby formula is out of stock nationwide.

Crisis after crisis, President Biden has failed to rise to the occasion.
